# SOLUTION
n, c = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Using elevator
elevator = [c + b[0]]
for i in range(1, n - 1):
    elevator.append(elevator[i - 1] + c + b[i])

# Using stairs
stairs = [0]
for i in range(1, n - 1):
    stairs.append(stairs[i - 1] + a[i - 1])

# Compute minimum
t = [0]
for i in range(1, n):
    t.append(min(elevator[i - 1], stairs[i - 1]))

print(' '.join(map(str, t)))


n, c = map(int, input().split()) 
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = [0] * n
for i in range(1, n):
    ans[i] = min(ans[i - 1] + a[i - 1], ans[i - 1] + c + b[i - 1])

print(*ans)
#!/usr/bin/env python3

# SOLUTION
n, c = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
a = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
b = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]

# Using elevator
elevator = [c + b[0]]
for i in range(1, n - 1):
    elevator.append(elevator[i - 1] + c + b[i])

# Using stairs
stairs = [0]
for i in range(1, n - 1):
    stairs.append(stairs[i - 1] + a[i - 1])

# Compute minimum
t = [0]
for i in range(1, n):
    t.append(min(elevator[i - 1], stairs[i - 1]))

print(*t)

n, c = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = [0] * n
for i in range(1, n):
    ans[i] = min(ans[i - 1] + a[i - 1], ans[i - 2] + c + b[i - 2])

print(*ans)

# SOLUTION
n, c = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

# Using elevator
elevator = [c + b[0]]
for i in range(1, n - 1):
    elevator.append(elevator[i - 1] + c + b[i])

# Using stairs
stairs = [0]
for i in range(1, n - 1):
    stairs.append(stairs[i - 1] + a[i - 1])

# Compute minimum
t = [0]
for i in range(1, n):
    t.append(min(elevator[i - 1], stairs[i - 1]) + b[i - 1])

print(*t)
from collections import defaultdict


n, m = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))[::-1]
b = list(map(int, input().split()))[::-1]

d = [defaultdict(int) for _ in range(n)]
d[0][a[0]] = 1
d[0][b[0]] = 1

for i in range(1, n):
    for j in d[i - 1]:
        if j + a[i] <= m:
            d[i][j + a[i]] += d[i - 1][j]
        if j + b[i] <= m:
            d[i][j + b[i]] += d[i - 1][j]

print(sum(d[n - 1].values()))
